synergynet3.projector.network.messages

Class ContentTransferedMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • synergynet3.web.shared.messages.PerformActionMessage
      • synergynet3.projector.network.messages.ContentTransferedMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ContentTransferedMessage>

    public class ContentTransferedMessage
extends PerformActionMessage
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ContentTransferedMessage>
    Structured message representing the item, its target and trajectory when transferred through a network flick.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContentTransferedMessage

        public ContentTransferedMessage()
        Empty Constructor used to initialise value in the network cluster.

      • ContentTransferedMessage

        public ContentTransferedMessage(java.lang.String[] targetDeviceIDs,
                        GalleryItemDatabaseFormat galleryItem,
                        float x,
                        float y,
                        float targetAngle,
                        float targetScale,
                        int zOrder,
                        boolean visible,
                        java.lang.String itemName)
        Create a structured network flick message for transmission through the cluster.
        Parameters:
        targetDeviceIDs - List of target table's identity in the cluster.
        galleryItem - Object representing the transfered item and its attached feedback.
        x - The X value of the transfered item's arrival location.
        y - The Y value of the transfered item's arrival location.
        targetAngle - Rotation of the transfered item on arrival.
        targetScale - Scale of the transfered item on arrival. *
        zOrder - the zOrder ID of the transfered item.
        Visibility - of the item being transferred.
        itemName - the unique ID of the transfered item.
